summary: Closes the chests inside the vault, in the Ragged Flagon Cistern area. This mod is mostly meant when you finish the Thieves Guild questline or after the quest "The Pursuit".
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][u]DESCRIPTION[/u][/size]
A simple mod that closes the chests in the Thieves Guild's vaults (Cistern area, not the Ratway vaults, mind you.). The chests won't respawn, which means you can safely store your stolen loot or whatever it is you want to store.


[size=3][u]INSTALLATION
[/u][/size]You can install it via NMM or just put the file in your Skyrim/Data
[u]UNINSTALL
[/u]Uninstall via NNM or simply delete the file


[size=3][u]ISSUES/COMPATIBILITY
[/u][/size]There shouldn't be any issues, I just replaced the open static chests inside the vaults with the closed container ones.
No DLC or anything else needed to run this.


[u][size=3]ANYTHING ELSE?
[/size][/u]I'm honestly not sure if this already exists on the Nexus, but I uploaded this on the Workshop maybe 2 years ago. Here is the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=90047392]Steam Workshop version[/url]ï»¿.
I might make a follower mod of my Skyrim character later.
author: TheBlueArgonian
